mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply ( rno, bno, replytext, replyer, secret_reply ) values ( reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{secret_reply})
mapper.select: select rno,bno,replytext,replyer,username, r.regdate,r.updatedate,secret_reply, (select writer from tbl_board where bno=r.bno) writer from tbl_reply r, tbl_member m where r.replyer=m.userid and bno=#{bno} order by rno
